subject: Re: Integrating Jemmy and JUnit
msgSnippet: ... Cool.. maybe I m on to something then :) I also make use of the Humble Dialog ideas from Mike Feathers.  I ve used that two phase GUI approach to good
messageBody:
> I'm doing the same thing as Dave Astels BTW.

Cool.. maybe I'm on to something then :)

I also make use of the "Humble Dialog" ideas from Mike Feathers. I've
used that two phase GUI approach to good result. It serves to make
most of the interface completely presentation independant without
putting any interface type code in the model.

Dave
